programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: No. 16 Virginia Tech heads out on the road to take on Boston College. The Hokies took a 31-17 loss to No. 2 Clemson in Week 5, their first loss of the season. Conversely, the Eagles got back in the win column with a 28-8 win over Central Michigan.
